title: Kangaroos. Part 1. Biography [Italian version]
brief_description: Part 1: Overviews the evolution of the Kangaroo, tracing its development over fifty species, from tree-dwellers to the better-known “Big Red”. The feeding, and mating habits of various species are examined, also birth and development in the pouch are studied
